title: 5 pcs Sublimation Blank T-Shirts Round Collar Short Sleeves Adult White Polyester t Shirts
description: 【Package includes】 5 pieces sublimation Blank T-shirts, US size, suitable for men and women

【High quality material】product is made of soft breathable fabric and polyester fiber, with elastic fabric, comfortable skin, suitable for summer; The fabric is carefully developed by us and can be washed many times.

【Operation tutorial】High quality fabrics can transfer hot stamping, is also a good choice for sublimation; The blank T-shirt is more suitable for you to DIY various personalized patterns according to your own hobbies for friends and family, suitable for home, party, holiday, office and other occasions
【Novel design】When you heat sublimation, the temperature can be 350-400 degrees Fahrenheit and the time can be 40-60 seconds, which makes the transmission image better and more vivid.

【Product Security】The company is engaged in thermal sublimation for more than ten years, developed a variety of creative products, has mature production experience, if you encounter any difficulty in the process of thermal sublimation production, please contact me, I am happy to solve the problem for you.
